alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 8:50PM MST until December 24 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches below 6500 feet with up to 15 inches across mountains and passes above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Idaho portion of the northern Wasatch Mountains, including Emigration Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow can reduce the effectiveness of road clearing efforts and highways and roads may be temporarily closed.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
